name: HidePostWP
author: mc17uulm

sections.installation:
1. Download zip and upload via wordpress installer, or search in plugins menu for “HidePost” and install plugin
  2. Activate plugin
  3. After activating the HidePost WordPres Plugin you will find a new metabox in your post editor. With a simple click on Hide Post on front page and saving your post, you can now select single posts to be hidden on your front and home page.
sections.description:
The HidePost WordPress Plugin allows you to hide specific posts on your front and home page.

HidePost WordPress Plugin

Version 0.1.1

The HidePost WordPress Plugin allows you to hide specific posts on your front and home page. The posts will stay visible in the category and archive pages.

Important: works only with the Classic Editor (Gutenberg support is planned in version 0.2)

How to Install

From the WordPress Plugin Directory

The official HidePost WordPress Plugin can be found here: https://wordpress.org/plugins/hidepostwp/

From GitHub

You find in the release section of the GitHub repository (https://github.com/mc17uulm/HidePost) the most recent releases. Download the newest one and upload it to your WordPress site (Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin).

How to Use

After activating the HidePost WordPres Plugin you will find a new metabox in your post editor. With a simple click on Hide Post on front page and saving your post, you can now select single posts to be hidden on your front and home page.
